QuestData.Title: Boar Training: Thundercall
QuestData.Description: The elements can sometimes pose a problem for some beasts. Even the mightiest wolf will often cower at the sound of thunder in the distance.$B$BIn Nagrand, off on a windswept cliff high above the shore, is a creature made of pure thunderstorms. Hop atop your beast and face off against Thundercall, and we will see how your mount fares.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Thundercall while riding your Boar-In-Training.
